question: Which is the first bank in India to launch a mobile application for opening a current account?
explanation:
IndusInd Bank has recently launched a mobile application-based facility for opening a current account, thereby becoming the first bank in the country to do so.
The new facility can be used to open current accounts for all kinds of businesses in a few hours. The facility is equipped with the bankâ€™s "Indus Corporate" mobile app and the officials can capture and verify information about customers and their businesses on a real-time basis.
